summary: A complex customizer for "Bijin Warmaidens". Adds a wide variety of textures and meshes to choose from.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Verdana][center]
[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img923/9589/79p9hH.png[/img]

[url=https://www.facebook.com/ClearanceClarenceMods][img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/640x480q90/924/cG7PGI.png[/img][/url]

[size=3][color=#e69138][b][i]Screenshots are Wanted! If some of you could upload some screenshots it would be much appreciated![/i][/b][/color][/size]

[color=#f4f4f4][size=4]This mod allows you to change the way the Warmaidens look. You can change the body textures, face and eyes. Download the mod with NMM to use the XML installer!
[/size][/color]

[img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/320x240q90/922/tUyKv0.png[/img]

[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40038/?]Bijin Warmaidens[/url][/size]
[size=4]If you plan to use  TBBP meshes, you also require the following:[/size]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics Extensions[/url][/size]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54044/?]HDT Breast And Butt Physics[/url][/size]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton - XPMS [/url] or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended - XPMSE
[/url][/size]

[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img924/2578/9D7W5O.png[/img]

[color=#0b8db3][size=6]Manual Installation[/size][/color]
[size=3]Download the package you want and extract it using WinRar. Now you have 3 folders. Base, FOMod and Options. Delete the FOMod folder since you won't need it. Now go to the base folder and select the bodytype you want and open that folder and copy the .nif files to [i][color=#6aa84f]data\meshes\actor\character\Bijin Warmaidens[/color][/i] and overwrite the .nif files. Now the body for every character is installed. Now go into the options folder and chose what kind of texture you want. The new version of the Bijin Warmaidens split the textures into three sets and you'll need to copy the textures you want into the folders for every set. The sets are found in [i][color=#6aa84f]data\textures\actor\character\Bijin Warmaidens 00, 01 and 02[/color][/i]. Once you have copied the textures into these folders the various textures for the characters is installed. I have removed SeveNBase as an installer. If you still insist on using them just copy the SeveNBase meshes over to the mesh folder above since UNP and SeveNBase uses the same textures[/size]

[color=#0b8db3][size=6]One of them looks weird[/size][/color]
[size=3]Some of the followers still have some basic textures in their unique folders. If one of the characters look weird go to the folder for the character and see if there is any body textures there. If there is just duplicate the corresponding texture from the set she was using to the character folder. The problem should now be solved[/size]

[color=#0B8DB3][size=6]Credits[/size][/color]
[size=5][color=#0B8DB3]Body Meshes[/color][/size]

[size=3][color=#0A7A9B]CBBE Meshes[/color][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE-[/url][/i][/size]

[size=3][color=#0A7A9B]UNP Meshes[/color][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/?]UNP Blessed Body[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40156/?]UNPC Body v2dot5[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35748/?]UNPetite[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41051/?]UNP Topmodel[/url][/i][/size]

[size=5][color=#0B8DB3]Body/Face Texture[/color][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Female Texture Renewal[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32986/?]Mature Skin Texture[/url][/i][/size]
